info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 1:47PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Laurens, southeastern Spartanburg and southwestern Union Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 146 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Laurens, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laurens, Clinton, Rose Hill State Park, Buffalo, Mountville, Cross Keys, Cross Anchor, Sedalia, Enoree and Ora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
